member.name: T:XslTransformer.FileChecker
member.summary: File checker provides a service to verify that a file or folder exists.

member.name: T:XslTransformer.Engine
member.summary:
The XmlTransformer.Engine processes an XML data file using XSL rules to create an HTML output file.
Usage: set the three file names, then call the Transform method..
The Engine will complain if either of the two input files does not exist, or if the specified folder of the output file does not exist..

member.name: T:XslTransformer.IEngine
member.summary:
The XmlTransformer.Engine processes an XML data file using XSL rules to create an HTML output file.
Usage: set the three file names, then call the Transform method..
The Engine will complain if either of the two input files does not exist, or if the specified folder of the output file does not exist..

member.name: M:XslTransformer.IEngine.Transform
member.summary: Transforms the XML input using the XSL rules to create the HTML output

member.name: M:XslTransformer.IEngine.Display
member.summary: Displays the HTML output in the default web browser

member.name: M:XslTransformer.IEngine.Validate(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Verifies that necessary files exist and that the output folder exists.
member.remarks: If argument showAlert is true, pop a message box
